title: Assassin’s Creed Free
description:
Get Assassin’s Creed PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Assassin’s Creed is the next-gen game developed by Ubisoft Montreal that redefines the action genre. While other games claim to be next-gen with impressive graphics and physics, Assassin’s Creed merges technology, game design, theme and emotions into a world where you instigate chaos and become a vulnerable, yet powerful , agent of change. The setting is 1191 AD.
The Third Crusade is tearing the Holy Land apart. You, Altair, intend to stop the hostilities by suppressing both sides of the conflict. You are an Assassin, a warrior shrouded in secrecy and feared for your ruthlessness. Your actions can throw your immediate environment into chaos, and your existence will shape events during this pivotal moment in history. Baldo: The Guardian Owls

system_requirements.Processor: Dual core processor 2.6 GHz Intel® Pentium® D
system_requirements.System Memory: Windows XP: 1 GB RAM / Windows Vista: 2 GB RAM
system_requirements.Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 or 10.0-compliant sound card (5.1 sound card recommended)
system_requirements.DirectX Version: Direct X 9.0 (Windows XP) or 10.0 (Windows Vista) libraries
